name: Frontier Pragmatists
vibe: Short on romance, long on duct tape.

name: Ledger Guilds
vibe: Everything has a price — including loyalty.

name: Starlit Theocracy
vibe: Pilgrims in pressure suits and saints in vacuum.

name: Orbital Junta
vibe: You can breathe, so you can obey.

name: Archivist Cities
vibe: They own the past, so they own you.

name: Free Habitats
vibe: No rulers, just airlocks and consequences.

name: Precursor Custodians
vibe: They claim stewardship of things older than language.

name: Vacuum Monasteries
vibe: Silence is oxygen; vows are pressure seals.

name: Clone Dynasties
vibe: Same faces, new centuries, old grudges.

name: Orbital Reefers
vibe: They grow homes like coral and harvest wrecks like kelp.

name: Comet Nomads
vibe: They ride dirty ice and call it destiny.

name: Syndicate Port
vibe: Customs is a negotiation; justice is a fee.

name: Glass Utopia
vibe: Perfect lawns under domes; perfect lies underneath.

name: Necropolis Operators
vibe: Graveyards in orbit; funerals by mass driver.

name: Choral Democracies
vibe: Votes are sung; dissent becomes harmony or exile.
